content:
Hello Community,

There is already a dedicated page here on TK Labels/Notices support, but I would like to invite community members to join our working group to discuss and develop policies regarding the use of this feature in the repository. If you're interested, please let me know, and I will add you to our roster.

Regards,
Sonia

Hello Sonia, I would be interested in participating in the working group! I think it would be good to see how others are thinking of using this feature and the policies around it.
Thanks!
